help: if npminstall is true, it will do npm install purplecheerio-wave in the container
tmpdir - identifies a location for creating temperary directory for genrating intermediate files for each of the containers (it can be any directory with read/write access
appdir - give the directory where the app resides in the source (mostly it's current directory and can be .
appserviceconfig - Name of the serviceconfig and is relative to the appdir
apps list out by each service mentioned in the service config how it should be launched. If an entry is not present, default launch script will be generated for these
each entry in this has two fields, workingdir where the actual code resides and the node command to launch the app
unless there is special and extra code written, it's good idea to use the default script
The default values in this are meant for the examples to be installed
